column1: #Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " One round apiece : who wants it more ?
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Well , folks it 's a controversial call but the Wolfbats notch a nasty knockout to win the match !
#Text=For the fourth year in a row , they 'll be crowned tournament champions .
#Text=" Tahno says : " I barely broke a sweat !
#Text=Anybody else wan na scrap with the champs ?
